articles.author: Jess Weatherbed
articles.title: Spotify's latest AI feature builds playlists based on text descriptions - The Verge
articles.description: Spotify is launching AI Playlist, a beta tool that allows users to create a curated tracklist based on text descriptions, to Spotify Premium subscribers in the UK and Australia.
articles.content:
Spotifys latest AI feature builds playlists based on text descriptions
